footer.contact: Let's get in touch on any of these platforms.
footer.whatsappshare: Report your health status to help fighting against the Covid-19!

renewReport.daysSince: It has been {days} days since your last report.
renewReport.explainOther: If you want to report for someone else, please use another phone, tablet or computer.

report.title: Report
report.intro: Help fighting against the new Coronavirus in Mexico by self-reporting your health status.
report.notSick: Great! Stay at home even if you're not sick to avoid propagation.
report.contracted: Regarding your recent social contacts, do you think you contracted {disease}?
report.contractedOfficialConfirmText: Have you been officially tested positive to {disease} by a recognized medical institution?
report.locationValidError: Please enter a valid postal number
report.errorDetails: An error occurred when sending your data
report.sentComeBack: Thank you for your contribution. Please come back if your health status changes.
report.sentSomeoneElse: If you want to report for someone else, please use another phone, tablet or computer.
report.sentMistake: You've made a mistake ? You can make a correction :

visualize.title: Visualize
visualize.dataWarning: The following data is community collected and not verified.

about.title: About
about.headWho: We are a team of swiss developers
about.who: that want to help to evaluate the current situation of the COVID-19 pandemia in our country.
about.needYou: Our app is based on your self-reporting...so that important that all of you come to update your health status in case of change.
about.headData: We don’t save any personal information in our servers!
about.data: Every data is anonymous but to keep our datasets consistent, we need that you use always the same browser to update your status (otherwise you will be counted twice).
about.dataUpdate: Realtime, well...no! We will provide update of the numbers as frequently as we can. But, you will need to wait a bit especially during the beginning phase of the app.
about.publicData: our dataset is public and open in our github. Please use it to make your own awesome visualization.
about.dataCare: keep in mind that our dataset is based on self-reporting from peoples thus the data are not official and could contains errors. The data is only intended to be used as an indicator.
about.improvement: of improvement or you want to report an error, please contact on Facebook.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.goalQuestion: What is the goal of this app?
faq.goalResponse: We aim to provide a visualization of the progression of the {disease} pandemic in our country. How can we 'flatten the curve' without having a statistical idea of the current situation? Help us by publishing your health status.
faq.othersQuestion: How do I report other members of my family?
faq.othersResponse: We are working on this issue. For now, you can use a different devices (phones, tablet, computer) for each member of your family.
